Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Meta:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#MetaFHIR R5 ComplexType `Meta` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta`.
Meta.versionId (versionId):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#Meta.versionIdElement `Meta.versionId` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta.versionId`.
Meta.lastUpdated (lastUpdated):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#Meta.lastUpdatedElement `Meta.lastUpdated` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta.lastUpdated`.
Meta.source (source):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#Meta.sourceElement `Meta.source` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta.source`.
Meta.profile (profile):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#Meta.profileElement `Meta.profile` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta.profile`.
Meta.security (security):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#Meta.securityElement `Meta.security` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta.security`.
Meta.tag (tag):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Meta#Meta.tagElement `Meta.tag` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Meta.tag`.

name: ConceptMapR5MetaElementsForR4Meta
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
